name: Md. Ariful Islam
text: The Asus ProArt Studiobook 16 is an impressive laptop made with content creators in mind, from its versatile input dial and 4K OLED screen to its high-flying AMD and Nvidia components.

name: Md. Tarikul Islam
text: It could stand a price cut, but the 14-inch, 2.3-pound Asus Chromebook CX9 is the very model of a capable business Chromebook.

name: Likhon
text: The Zephyrus S17 is a highly capable 17.3-inch gaming machine with exotic touches and a supercar price.
